Venue Locations
Curtis M. Phillips Center for the Performing Arts
PO Box 112750
3201 Hull Road
Gainesville, FL 32611-2750
Phone: 352.392.1900
Box Office Phone: 352.392.ARTS
Also Located in the Phillips Center Are:
• Squitieri Studio Theatre
• UpStage
Parking is available in the parking garage and the surface lots at the University of Florida Cultural Plaza. Parking is free on weekends and after 3:30pm on weekdays (prior to that on weekdays these lots require a UF Parking Decal). Free parking is also made available for all Phillips Center events (including lifting parking restrictions for events during weekdays).
View a PDF of the Phillips Center Parking Map »
Phillips Center Parking Map
University Auditorium
(corner of Union Road and Newell Drive)
PO Box 112755
333 Newell Drive
Gainesville, FL 32611-2755
Phone: 352.392.2346
Parking for University Auditorium is available on campus in the parking garage at Newell Road and Museum Road.

Baughman Center
PO Box 112548
982 Museum Road
Gainesville, FL 32611-2548
Phone: 352.294.0049

Baughman Center page
